description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:15.6" (39.6 cm)
Резолуција:(1920 x 1280) FHD, micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nits, 45% NTSC
Chipset: Intel® Integrated SoC
Процесор: Intel® Core™ i5-1235U (up to 4.4 GHz with Intel® Turbo Boost Technology, 12 MB L3 cache, 10 cores, 12 threads)
Графика: Intel® Iris® X? Graphics
RAM Меморија: 8 GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM (2 x 4 GB)
Диск (Storage): 512 GB PCIe® NVMe™ M.2 SSD
Без оперативен систем
Realtek RTL8822CE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (2x2) Wi-Fi® and Bluetooth® 5 wireless card
Камера: HP True Vision 720p HD camera with temporal noise reduction and integrated dual array digital microphones
Аудио:Dual speakers
Порти:
1 USB Type-C® 5Gbps signaling rate
2 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate
1 AC smart pin
1 HDMI 1.4b
1 headphone/microphone combo
Power:45 W Smart AC power adapter
Батерија:3-cell, 41 Wh Up to 7 hours and 30 minutes
